body_html:
Hi:
Yes, the SDK/NDK path is already configured, and if the "bazel" command line has "x86" build config ?

because I'm using x86 Android emulator...(run faster the arm version ^_^)

PS: when I use ARM ver emulator, the so lib can be found

body:
Hi:
 Yes, the SDK/NDK path is already configured, and if the "bazel" command line has "x86" build config ?

because I'm using x86 Android emulator...(run faster the arm version ^_^)

PS: when I use ARM ver emulator, the so lib can be found
